description.message:
**About CG for Service**
CG for Service delivers high-touch quality service and equips agents with integrated telesales capabilities powered by penny perfect pricing to cross sell and up sell products.

**Base Plan** - Installs metadata configurations that help you get your org up and running. Recommended for all customers.

**Post Install Steps**: Follow the [document](https://salesforce.quip.com/ZhfxAPToyyPO) to manually configure CTI call setup.

**IMPORTANT**: Salesforce does not recommend installing directly in production organizations. Instead, install in one of your free sandbox environments, or a developer organization first.
